snippet: Ed Helms is heard in “Dr. Seuss’ The Lorax” and seen in “Jeff, Who Lives at Home.” And he continues to juggle his television role in “The Office,” where he got a promotion.
abstract: Television actor Ed Helms, who is also heard in Dr. Seuss’ The Lorax and seen in Jeff, Who Lives at Home, is drawn to characters who, like him, strive to be better versions of themselves and just get in their own way.
lead_paragraph: Ed Helms is heard in “Dr. Seuss’ The Lorax” and seen in “Jeff, Who Lives at Home.” And he continues to juggle his television role in “The Office,” where he got a promotion.

headline.seo: Ed Helms Is Back in ‘Jeff Who Lives at Home’
headline.main: Ambitious, but in a Polite Sort of Way
headline.print_headline: Ambitious, But in a Polite Sort of Way
